ygData.subject: Re: Idea for language class...
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree.  That is a terrific idea. ... From: Paul McClung  To:  Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 12:06 PM
ygData.messageBody:
I agree. That is a terrific idea.

----- Original Message -----
From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 12:06 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Idea for language class...


> From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>
>
> I think the language class should be held on the boat that goes from
> Faydwer to Freeport.
>
> Classes on the boat could have lots of advantages:
>
> * People can wait at the docks and hop on or hop off as needed.
> * Convientent for people already traveling between Fawdwer and Freeport
> * No spells
> * Plenty of fishing available
> * Boat zones periodically so skills can be checked
> * A wide variety of people ride the boat, so it may be possible to pick
up
> other languages that you didn't plan on.
>
> * And lastly, I think its just a really novel idea! :)
>
>
> Flik
>
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: where the world talks!
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today.
>
